unittitle_ssm: This Week and The Clubwomen's World magazine collection
abstract_ssm: This Week, later titled The Clubwomen's World, was a weekly women's magazine published in Brooklyn during the late 1920s and 1930s.  Initially containing only social news relating to Brooklyn Heights, the magazine later expanded its coverage to include social news relating to additional Brooklyn neighborhoods, the activities of Brooklyn women's clubs, and the greater New York City area.  This collection contains several issues of This Week and The Clubwomen's World spanning the period March 10, 1928 to March 25, 1933.
